official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to restore the nonservice-connected burial benefit entitlement to survivors of certain wartime veterans.

summary.text: Provides a burial benefit entitlement for any veteran discharged from active duty for a service-connected disability. (Currently, there must be no next of kin claiming the body and insufficient familial resources for burial in order to receive such entitlement.)

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to restore the nonservice-connected burial benefit entitlement to survivors of certain wartime veterans.
